name: Mythix: Adventures in Lore
blurb: The Ancient Mythix have called upon you!\nYou alone must set right the ancient myths of the Greek, Egyptian, Celtic, and Norse!

rewards.reward: BELIEVER TIER                        \r\n==============================\r\nBeta Access, Player Title 1, Bonus Dungeons & Backer Badge
PROPHET TIER                        \r\n==============================\r\nBeta Access, Player Title 1 & 2, Bonus Dungeons, Backer Badge, Exclusive Card Backs & 10 Booster Packs

For only $20 you can get all the perks of the $50 Tier! Just make sure you get it in time! MYTHIX TIER                        \r\n==============================\r\nBeta Access, Player Title 1-6, Bonus Dungeons, Backer Badge, 2 Exclusive Card Backs, 40 Booster Packs for You and A Friend, Backer Exclusive Avatar Options, Digital Art Book, Collectible Stickers, Special Edition Card, Double Custom Deck Slots, Name in the Special Thanks Credits, Name In About Us Section All Myth Special Items and Rewards for You AND 3 Friends, Master Title, Master Card Back, Mythix 2 T-Shirts, Bonus Exclusive Poster, Mythix iPad Case, Printed Art Book, Special Card Border, Printed Collectors Card with your Likeness (Not In Game), Achievement With Your Name In It, Sean Will Write A Song About Anything You Want (Topic Pends Approval), Video Chat With Us About The Game & Dinner on us in NYC To Talk About The Game And Its Future!
